Name: Operation Sniff
About the game: Operation Sniff game for one or two players. In a single player game you have to play for a dog and complete all the tasks assigned to you. In the mode of confrontation, players have to choose the role of a person or a dog, and fight among themselves, destroying each other or completing all tasks. First person game. Playing against AI or playing against another player. You can pick up and throw objects, use weapons, interact with each other (kick a dog, spit a person). The dog player needs: Prevent all human plans. Create chaos. Find everything you need in a personâ€™s house. Eliminate the target. The human player needs: Fulfill all your plans. Eliminate the agent. Don't let your secrets be revealed.
